text: Hana Brejchová (12 December 1946 – 22 April 2024) was a Czech actress. She performed in over 30 movies and was the sister of actress Jana Brejchová. She died at a nursing home in Buštěhrad, around 20 April 2024, at the age of 77. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 1965 Loves of a Blonde Andula 1967 Stronghold of Toughs Marija 1968 Jak se zbavit Helenky hlasatelka Marcelka 1968 Žirafa v okne Milena 1969 Nejkrásnější věk Vránová 1969 À quelques jours près Květa 1970 Po stopách krve Innkeeper Vlasta Veselá 1978 Já to tedy beru, šéfe...! Anička 1978 Dinner for Adele Madam #3 Uncredited 1981 Matěji, proč tě holky nechtějí? title: Hana Brejchová
